attributes.action: Homosexuals should be allowed to give blood.
attributes.additional_details: If we can be 100% certain that a homosexual person is not contaminated with any disease, namely the AIDs virus, then they should be able to give blood just as anybody else does. If it is uncertain whether they do or do not possess a disease, then their offer of donation should be put on hold until there is confirmation that they are either clean or not.

rejection.details: You will also find there are petitions on this issue already so this may be duplicating an existing petition.
